title: When Thomas Jefferson said in 1801, "We are all...

content.prompt: When Thomas Jefferson said in 1801, “We are all republicans – we are all federalists,” he meant that

choices.label: Americans would never ally themselves with monarchial governments
federalists would be appointed to his cabinet
the principles of American government were above party politics

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
